website_summaries.verdict: This simple yet reliable mop is a perfect choice for buyers wanting a no-nonsense, inexpensive tool.
pros: Simple design makes for an easy-to-use mop
Mop head is removable and machine washable
Compatible with O-Cedar's Quick-Wring Bucket and Mop refills
cons: Doesn't include wringing bucket or mop refills
Shorter than a few customers expected

customer_reviews.title: Great mop with telescoping (yes!) handle and mophead can go in washer!
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps the best mop for general purposes. Some drawbacks prevent it from perfection for heavier cleaning tasks. I love the telescoping handle but it was tricky to extend the first time. Use pliers at the end of the mop by the mop head. I love the microfiber head and though I still have to try the wash in washing machine aspect, I like how it cleans. One caveat: it does have the potential to scratch. As I mop it does appear that it could because often the straps of microfiber don't stay well under the mop head and the plastic scrapes against the floor. That is my biggest complaint so far.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Is this really short mop really not extendable, or can I just not figure it out?
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows an extendable mop, but unless I'm dumber than I look, mine (and a number of other reviewers) seems to be really short. Why would you make a mop with such a short handle? I have to bend way over. The cleaning is fine, but it's not going to be fun to use unless I can replace the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenlyn

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a microfiber mop that I could wring so it wouldn't leave streak marks on my tile floors Pros - it doesn't leave streak marks! Easy to use Cons - agree with other reviews, it would be better if the handle was longer. Somewhat awkward to use. Also the plastic at the end of the mop head sometimes digs into the floor if you mop too hard. Overall I'm happy and going to purchase the wringing bucket to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Bird

customer_reviews.title: Using with care
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same mop three weeks earlier from Amazon and loved it. (Gets in the corner better than other string or strip mops, so I quickly place a second order.) The second mop looks identical, but when mopping the porcelain tile, the plastic head hit the floor unless I was slow and precise in placing the mop in such a way that the fiber strips cover the plastic. Planned to return it, but my house-cleaner said she can work with it and as we needed mops in two different locations and this style is still better than what we're able to find locally from big box stores, hardware or grocery, we're going to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great economical mop
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace this mop that I originally bought at a large box store. I tried to remove the mop head to wash it & unwrapped the whole mop. The box store sold me a mop that didn't have a detachable head that I could throw in the wash machine. Thank goodness for Amazon. They sent me the correct mop at a great price. It picks up the toughest of dirt & grime (with soap and water of course - sold separately) For the price you can't go wrong & you can take the head off to throw in the wash machine which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DSutphin

customer_reviews.title: Used Mine For The 1st Time Today.  Works Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Absorbs water nicely. Wrings out (mine by hand) just as easily. This customer very satisfied with the product. One more thing: I am old and have used mops countless times. This particular mop is lightweight, which is a fine quality for one like me.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT ADJUSTABLE OR TELESCOPING
customer_reviews.text: Some folks have talked about using pliers to separate the pieces of this mop handle and activate the adjustability of the thing. I believe they received the proper mop as listed here. But what I (and many others) received is NOT that mop. It's a good mop in every other way, but it's uncomfortably short for even a moderately tall person (I'm 5'11, not a giant). It is not adjustable. False advertising. I think the company discontinued the adjustable version because it's not on their website either. I'm keeping this one because it was $8 and I need a mop. But I'm keeping an eye out for an adjustable O-Cedar.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martins

customer_reviews.title: Finally, no hands in dirty water
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. I think it's not quite easy to get the perfect swing and actually clean the floor instead of spreading the dirt all over the place. Nonetheless, I'm sure I'll get the hang of it and I'm thrilled that my rubber gloves are no longer needed. All pieces are sturdy and solid. Most of all, I like that the handle comes in one piece and doesn't need to be assembled. You can actually use some pressure when handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Not made to clean with
customer_reviews.text: I have used oh Cedar for 30 years. I bought an oh Cedar in the store the red and white mop with washable head. Bottom keep on screwing. So I bought my old standby the one that looks like handy wipes. The handle won’t stay extended the top hook keeps on screwing and pinching my hand it’s a piece of junk. I’m really dissatisfied. I don’t complain about anything. This was so bad I just had to warn everyone.
customer_reviews.author: C Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Handle is not telescoping
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered this because the description says that the handle in telescoping. It came in and it is not telescoping. I needed a mop where the handle is short for the RV and it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Donna E.

customer_reviews.title: Made me happy!
customer_reviews.text: After getting our newer motorhome that has real ceramic tile in it, I tried using a swiffer pad with just plain water and was so disgusted with the streaks that it left, so did some research and found that everybody uses the microfiber mops and is very satisfied with the results. So my O CEDAR microfiber mop came yesterday and I used it with just plain water and my floors look awesome, now I'm just waiting for my bucket to arrive to have the complete set.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGirr

customer_reviews.title: Only in Part Delivered
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it would be a high quality mop but I wouldn’t know. Because it showed up here without the broom stick handle part. Really annoying to be honest. If the handle shows up I’ll revise my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ailisheva

customer_reviews.title: Product needs redesign
customer_reviews.text: This sliding mop shaft got stuck in one position (even the strongest of the movers couldn't budge it) so that when we were moving and couldn't collapse it to fit into a moving box, we had no choice but to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: ngrokh

customer_reviews.title: great mop!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mop! I mean as much as you can love a mop! It works really well! It gets in the corners and up this side of the wall a bit which my Swiffer didn't do. This mop rings out and rinses easily and my floors are squeaky clean. I can also take the head off and throw it into the washer which is a must for me. I was getting tired of buying mop pads for my Swiffer and it was getting expensive. I realized they weren't cleaning very well either. Swiffers are great for quick clean ups, like if something has spilled. Buy this mop! You'll be happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Tried it out and am happy
customer_reviews.text: This works better than I thought (with the O-Cedar bucket). I get good coverage with the map and it wrings dry enough in the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mop; handle won't lock
customer_reviews.text: Editing because I've now used it twice and it's permanently broken. I got one (poor quality) use out of the product, and now it's dead. Pole won't extend, so my back is sore from bending over to mop. Repeated looking online and attempts to secure the pole don't work, and I'm frustrated and feel scammed. This product is garbage, avoid at all costs. --- previous review --- This is an okay mop -- not pro quality but fine for a kitchen floor. But I found it difficult to secure the pole when extended, and the second time I'm trying to mop it simply won't lock in the extended position at all. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: R. DAMM

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like this mop and it does the job well. The head of mop does screw off, but be prepared to use extra pressure. It will come off--some said it will not but it does. It fuller than my rope style mop that was worn out. I do think it is fuller and holds a lot of water and less if desired. Best if you have a bucket with a mechanism that help wring it out. I subtract one star as it has metal and it you push to hard and fast it can touch the floor. But my old rope mop was much worse. I am going to plan on buying this again regardless
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad arthritis in my hands so a heavy mop is painful for me to use. These are light but very sturdy. I'm so glad I decided to try this mop. The microfiber mop head does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for tile floor
customer_reviews.text: This mop works great on tile floor. I have mostly tile in my house so I do a lot of mopping. I prefer this style of mop, and it does a good job. I also love the fact that I can just throw this in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse

customer_reviews.title: My back is thankful! Floors too!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific. Have the bucket that goes with it too. A mighty team for keeping clean floors. I was very frustrated for years wth sponge mops which do not clean behind toilets (even tried a steamer behind toilet for germs) and the old fashioned rag mops that you have to wring by hand. Getting on hands and knees threw my back out. So this saved me! I'm thankful to O CEDAR. I FIRST GOT THE DUO from a hardware chain, but when I went back couldn't find it. Searched the Internet to no avail. So I am also thankful to AMAZON for having both mop and bucket! Low tech but extremely affective.
customer_reviews.author: Fleurette Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great mop, love it for tile and wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mop for bathroom floors (tile and linoleum) and also well wrung out on our hardwood floors. It does a great job. Easy to wash in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from WI

customer_reviews.title: Best mop ever. Has extending pole!
customer_reviews.text: Best mop ever and I have been a housekeeper for over 30 years.This one even has an extending pole to save your lower back. Buy one, you will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It exceeds my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My mother had one and my wife used it and wanted me to get her one. She loves it because it cleans wells without being too heavy. She says the best part is that you can put it in the washer. She has washed ours 5 times and it looks just like it did the day we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Mop head swivels around
customer_reviews.text: This is prob the 3rd time I’m writing a review as to the defected mop i recieved. Like i stated previously, the mop head spins around. The screw thread on the pole seems to be stripped and there’s no way of tightening the mop head. I have not received any information on how this problem could be resolved. I would like. A replacement to compensate for the damaged item. I would be happy to return the defected mop.
customer_reviews.author: colleen harrell

customer_reviews.title: Mop handle would not extend
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer already stated the handle does not extend as advertised. I did my best to extend the handle because I did not want to have to send this mop back. I am very disappointed and regrettably I am sending this mop back because it is too short for me as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lana's Turn

customer_reviews.title: While I love this mop because I owned one
customer_reviews.text: While I love this mop because I owned one. One of the two I ordered was broken. I bought a new one for me and one for my mother who loved it since day one when she started using it. She had previously used mine to mop my home. I had been looking to find it at a store which is where I bought it the first time. The stick though could be made heavy-duty or close to it to be able to replace the cloth only. It could have been nice if the quality of the stick was made to last. The broken one that I received I could have changed the cloth only.
customer_reviews.author: Minnieg003

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mildew, won't air-dry
customer_reviews.text: This mop works well enough, but after three days it was still not dry, and smelled strongly of mildew after day one following the first use. Second replacement mophead, same deal. I am wringing it out after use. I just don't understand the positive reviews. I live in an apartment and I'm not going to go to the laundry room in the basement to put it in the dryer every time I use it----but that should not be needed, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F. Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Best mop I have ever owned- it comes completely clean in the wash which means I'm not starting off with a half dirty mop each time. One thing it is a bit hard to wring out-- it is very thirsty and takes in a lot of water, so it takes a bit of work to wring all that water out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mop but small handle
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric in this mop. It does a great job. My only problem is the handle is so small. It would work great for a child but not an adult. I use it anyway even getting a backache from it. I do wish they would make a full sized handle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: It works. It is washable. It dries quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. It is washable. It dries quickly. What else could one ask for?
customer_reviews.author: prolificrdr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mop!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *Easy to use *Picks up grime, hair, and dirt wonderfully *Re-washable mop head is awesome *Easy to assemble/disassemble Cons: *For full potential, requires bucket that can wring (more money!) *Head comes off a bit too easily - sometimes simply mopping too vigorously one way will untwist it. Just be careful while you mop!
customer_reviews.author: Adalwolf

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It works for the price, but it's gross to hand-wring a mop & the black plastic on the top of the microfiber is always scratching the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The specs on this mop is not accurate. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The specs on this mop is not accurate. The mop head is 10 inches or so long not 15 inches that the description states. If the plastic piece is included in the measurement then its 12 inches and still not the 15 inches. This mop is more suited for a residential mop than commercial one.
customer_reviews.author: smarty

customer_reviews.title: All are Okay except for its length of handlebar. ...
customer_reviews.text: All are Okay except for its length of handlebar. I had been using one of your previous item for the type for years before getting the new one, By comparing in their length, I wonder why the new one is designed much shorter as it was? So, very natually, it leads into a bit uncomfortable and pain in my waist each time after using. . ( Please refer the photo below attached )
customer_reviews.author: Yuhong

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I received my mop & bucket & used it once so far. It is easy to use and wring out & does a great job. However, I gave it three stars because when finished, the mop head does not dry. It has been 2 days now & the mop head is still wet. I wish I knew what to do to dry this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: ... hard time deciding on mops and i am very happy with this blue microfiber one
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time deciding on mops and i am very happy with this blue microfiber one. I read that some have cut the loops but so far i don't see that doing so is necessary but i will keep it in mind. But the mop got everything off the floor really well; plus, i didn't even sweep first! I used the "red bucket" and everything worked very nicely. I bought one for my brother too because i don't even think he had a mop.
customer_reviews.author: atomic jOY

customer_reviews.title: Ummmmm
customer_reviews.text: Well, I received the mop and I am extremely disappointed. The mop handle is too short and The mop material strips are far less than I expected. I am 5'6 tall, when I mop I have to bend over so far. To me the handle is shorter than the mops I purchase from the store. Also, when I mop, the handle end where the material cup is (the round shape part the material strips go into) hits the floor and sounds screechy. It's like there's not enough material strips. I will be getting me another and give this one to my sons wife.
customer_reviews.author: MsKitti

customer_reviews.title: Great mop! I did not need to cut the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mop! I did not need to cut the loops as recommended in some previous posts, and the plastic attachment also does not scrap my floors. The micro fibers do a great job picking up little bits of dirt, dust, and pet hair our old cotton mop missed. This was an excellent buy, and I would defiantly purchase an O-Cedar product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Chapman

customer_reviews.title: The mop is fine. The mop head is nice
customer_reviews.text: The mop is fine. The mop head is nice, the handle is cheap... mostly irritated at myself for not reading reviews or paying attention tion to the fact that there is no way to wring it out w/o also getting a bucket with a wringer...
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best Mop I ever bought. But you should buy the bucket with the ringer attached to make mopping the floors effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Gadget

customer_reviews.title: This mop is okay
customer_reviews.text: I am an older person and it is a little heavy when wet. It holds too much water for me
customer_reviews.author: Mary - NC

customer_reviews.title: SUPER MOP
customer_reviews.text: GREAT MOP. A FRIEND, WHO IS A PROFESSIONAL HOUSEKEEPER OF 20 YRS., RECOMMENDED THIS PRODUCT. SHE HAD NEVER USED THE QUICK-WRING BUCKET WITH IT, BUT LOVE THE ONE I ORDERED. IT DRYS FASTER THAN AN ORDINARY MOP HEAD. I DID NOT HAVE A WASHER TO WASH THE MOP HEAD, SO I WASHED IT BY HAND, AND I USED THE BUCKET TO WRING IT OUT, THEN FANNED IT OUT OVER THE BUCKET TO DRY. THE MATERIAL OF THE MOP HEAD SEEMS TO BE LIKE A QUICK DRYING TOWEL.
customer_reviews.author: MOE

customer_reviews.title: Nice mop sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice mop need to use in correct bucket or it won’t wring out correctly
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Mop head loosens during use
customer_reviews.text: The microfiber cloth head loosens during use. Otherwise it’s good. I may have to superglue it on permanently which negates it’s ability to throw in washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: joroh7

customer_reviews.title: Great little mop.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mop over a year now. It is awesome. I love that it can be washed. I mop once or twice a month so being able to put it though the wash and know that it's sterile for the next use is a necessity. It mops as well as any other mop I've had, so no complaints there. Overall a great mop.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Fluffy mop head and nice handle. EZ removal of mop head to throw into washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found it, I had been browsing through Amazon for a while looking for just regular household mops, not the heavy duty stuff they use at schools and such. So happy I saw this one, very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: linker47

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleans in your washer
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated wringing maps dry and this solves the problem!Love the material I just throw it in the washer and I’m ready to go with a clean mop head.
customer_reviews.author: Keller Fisher

customer_reviews.title: mop of the century
customer_reviews.text: What a mop. I have a twenty year old linoleum floor that was uncleanable. This mop cleaned nicely. Yon need to purchase the O-Cedar bucket. One reviewer recommends using 1 tablespoon white vinegar and a little amount of dishwashing liquid. If you have the bucket, fill it one third with hot water and the cleaning solution and you will have a clean floor.
customer_reviews.author: zag186

customer_reviews.title: It’s light and it cleans
customer_reviews.text: Super absorbent, light weight, withstands bleach without falling apart, no need to rinse every few swipes. Great mop.
customer_reviews.author: Contessa Mcpike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Seller and product are the best. I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Handle was appallingly short
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order of one of these mops ( I bought it for my mother) but this one is so short I have to use a broom handle instead... very strange...
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: Just received my mop yesterday and used it today. We have 3 dogs so I need to scrub the floor almost daily. It worked so well on my laminate flooring and it was so easy to use with the wringer bucket. I used to hate getting ready to mop because is was so time consuming and nasty trying to wring a big mop or squeeze out a sponge mop. In addition the o cedar m op also picks up any left over dog hair from my sweeping. I am a believer and will be ordering a replacement head so that I always have a clean one ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ruble

customer_reviews.title: Messy Mop
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this mop, and was hoping it would be better than all the rest. However, I was extremely disappointed. The mop was hard to wring out which created pools of water on the floor. The mop did not pick up dirt well. Instead, It spread the dirt around the floor. It made the dirt clump up into a pile of messiness. I've used cheaper mops that work better than this one. This mop just wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: MissBrit

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Quick-Wring Bucket
customer_reviews.text: After using this a couple of times, I really like it. I use it with the "Quick-Wring Bucket" that is also sold by O-Cedar. The pair of them do an excellent job. One wrings out the mop by pressing it downward into the strainer cup. It's hard to believe but that works well. The strainer cup also has a small holder so that when one is finished, one can stand the mop upright in the bucket for storage.
customer_reviews.author: CrankyToday

customer_reviews.title: Handle DOES NOT telescope
customer_reviews.text: A telescoping handle means it should be able to be made longer or shorter. I know, because that's the one I had that I'm replacing. This is just a solid handle. On the other hand, the telescoping handle rusted, so maybe this one will last longer. And my kitten loves playing in the 6-foot-long box it came in, so that's a win.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Geek

customer_reviews.title: A housewife's redemption
customer_reviews.text: After more than 50 years of searching for a floor cleansing tool that wouldn't leave me painfully exhausted, I have found the O-Cedar Microfiber to be the only cloth mop that, without being extremely heavy, will thoroughly wipe away the most difficult unwanted floor spots and stains. I was more than glad to find it in the Amazon web page, where I ordered two. I really love its light weight and its sturdy unique base of cloth strips, so reliable, hassle-free, and so ingeniously different to the rest of the currently available mops. My thanks to the designers of the O-Cedar Microfiber for doing their job with the housewives in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Maduro-Romano

customer_reviews.title: cumbersom and disgusting. I threw it away
customer_reviews.text: Ugly, cumbersom and disgusting. I threw it away. The handle is smooth and you can't grip it right. That's not the only thing. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Make it bigger please!
customer_reviews.text: The microfiber is genius! It does a great job cleaning stubborn areas. The only downside is that it needs to be like 3x bigger than it is, its like mopping with a mop made for children LOL. The mop handle is so short you have to bend over while cleaning which can take a toll on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: This mop cleans better than normal mops
customer_reviews.text: The handle is too short, but cleans better than a regular mop. Will buy this one again. Very pleased with this purchase. Great product,. So much easier to use than a larger mop
customer_reviews.author: zox

customer_reviews.title: Never judge a mop by the way it looks. Lol
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first because the mop is extremely light weight. I underestimated this mop. However the microfiber mop head deep cleaned my floors very well. Compact! Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Goddess724

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Plusher than expected. Which is a good thing. Perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Caldwellis

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement I needed.
customer_reviews.text: My old mop pole was about 10 years old & broke due to rust. I still had 5 replacement mops heads so this new mop pole is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mop but...
customer_reviews.text: The handle is not telescopic, just a straight metal tube.
customer_reviews.author: 286A Chief

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the bucket that wrings out the mop bc I liked the idea of not touching the dirty mop. Unfortunately, the strips offer no scrubbing ability. Pressing harder on the handle does nothing. It's hard to direct the strips on the mop also. I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Cajun

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mop I have ever owned Still looks like new
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop I have ever owned Still looks like new. Easy to wring out, rinses well. A little Simple Green in half a mop bucket of water to mop my wood floors makes them look like they have been waxed and brand new. No rinsing. Shipping as promised and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Salmons

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly heavyweight mop head and tough but absorbent material make for an effective mop. This works much better than expected -- and I've been using it on a basement floor and outdoor wood deck, both of which are pretty abrasive surfaces. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious-Trousers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST MOP EVER!!!! It's even better if you buy the matching bucket because then it's hands free!
customer_reviews.author: K. Andreasen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This mop is so short nobody wants to use it. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barris

customer_reviews.title: My cleaning lady asked me to get this for her ...
customer_reviews.text: My cleaning lady asked me to get this for her and she loves it. You can throw this in the wash and reuse for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Length cannot be adjusted, too short!
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to adjust the height. Unless you are about 4’5” you will be mopping with one hand. The supposedly telescopic height adjustment does not work. I even tried pliers as some users have done. Poorly designed!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not for Ppl with Arthritis in their hands
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop but if you have arthritis in your hands , its not the one for you
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wood

customer_reviews.title: It is absorb waters and easy to wash and wring with a quick-wring bucket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the second time for another home. The mop is made with durable Microfiber Cloth. I used it to mop floors this morning. It is absorb waters and easy to wash and wring with a quick-wring bucket. It is good! I like it!
customer_reviews.author: YUAN

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: Great mop. Works best with the bucket that goes with this. Love that the microfiber head can be washed. I hate to mop (who enjoyed it?), but I find it fast and easy with this mop and bucket.
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: really like it
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this mop because it is very absorbent and picks up a lot of dirt. I mopped an area that I thought was clean and found a lot of grime on the mop after I finished. I like that it is very light weight and the handle seems to be just the right length.
customer_reviews.author: only4me

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The fabric grabs everything, especially hair on floors. It rinses easy and is great to use on walls too. Super easy to machine wash and always returns to 'sticky' mop afterwards. I love this and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Slawson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really rinse out well. But worked for what ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really rinse out well. But worked for what we needed it for. Can't be used with other o'cedar buckets.
customer_reviews.author: kathi echelberger

customer_reviews.title: The floor does not care your hands and knees will thank you!🤗
customer_reviews.text: I am 52 and I should have bought this 10 years ago this is an absolutely wonderful mop I bought the bucket that goes along with it
customer_reviews.author: Stuart shannon

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I expected a thick mop. ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected a thick mop. However, this is rather thin mop. It works on tile floors but it will scratch any type of wood floor. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby and April

customer_reviews.title: I don't love this as much as the reviews made me think I would.
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this as much as the reviews made me think I would. The mop head comes off a lot while I am mopping it no matter how hard I twist it back on. Plus, it just doesn't seem to clean my floors that well. I just feel like I am moving dirt around on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Francois

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have a ringer
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a wringer in the mop, and there isn't one, so I had to buy a bucket that has a ringer. So, "meh"
customer_reviews.author: amybeth7

customer_reviews.title: didnt like the adjustable handles
customer_reviews.text: this wasn't for me. didnt like the adjustable handles. it was either too long or too short. Im 5'1, so it was a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Totally dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product at all. The handle will not stay screwed on to mop head. Continually comes off. I used it on my laminate wood floor and it left the floors very streaky. Tossing it out. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mop.
customer_reviews.text: Good mop... Waaaay over-priced! Target has it for just under 10 bucks :( We found this out before opening this order, but when starting the return process, we discovered that it will cost $7.02 to return it. So, we kept it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: mcwdes

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the mop is an upgrade from traditional mops. I find that mop nowadays with fancy buttons are difficult to use and they don't really do the job that well! This mop makes my floor clean unlike other mops and the best part is - it's machine washable!
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Broke after two uses , on the first use the some of the strands ripped apart . On the second use the plastic that hold the mop to together broke off .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Guero

customer_reviews.title: Such an
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop for my apartment. It’s durable, soaks up well and easy to clean in washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best mop I've ever owned, I over wet the mop to wash the floor and then wring it out really well in the O-cedar quick wring bucket to pick up the excess water...clean floors with out washing them on my hands and knees!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Kazlauskas

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs GREAT and doestn't leave floors too wet when moping
customer_reviews.text: Used this mop for years, but couldn't find a replacement in any stores. Absorbs GREAT and doestn't leave floors too wet when moping.
customer_reviews.author: MawMaw

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Just received and used for the first time and one of the strips just broke. Apart from that, it doesn't have enough strips just under the plastic part so you find yourself rubbing the plastic against the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mop if used with the matching bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cat's Meow of mops. Combined with the red bucket that has the spiral wringer on top, it is so easy top drop the mop in, turn it the bucket attachment and wring it the the level of dryness or wetness you want. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Fab Cuban

customer_reviews.title: My cleaning lady has one and loves it! I ...
customer_reviews.text: My cleaning lady has one and loves it! I bought one on her recommendation. Going to use it to clean a 72' and 6' high white vinyl fence in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: LIT

customer_reviews.title: Great wipe up mop.
customer_reviews.text: This mop is so absorbent. A great mop to have around in the winter to mop up all the snow from boots that were not removed at the door. I like the fact that you can purchase refill heads that are easy to take off and put on. The mop head washes well also.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: With the O-Cedar name, this should be better. One of the strands came loose before I even used it and you have to hold it a certain way so the handle end doesn't rub on the floor, It's definitely only okay.
customer_reviews.author: amartin

customer_reviews.title: Great mop ... microfiber is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Great mop, especially when combined with the Rubbermaid FG619400 HDPE Pail and Mop Strainer Combination. Picks up dirt, dust, dog hair much better than old sponge mops or cotton string mops. When properly squeezed out, you don't leave a bunch of water on the floor either, dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: HATE THE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: this mop takes forever to dry and smells sour before it does...YUCK...
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop Ever Made!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mop because my son borrowed and never returned the first. I bought my first several years ago in a local store. When it needed to be replaced, the only place I could find it was on Amazon. Several of my neighbors now use this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop. It wrings out well using plastic gloves. What others have been saying about this mop are all true! Best mop I have used. If you are going to buy one mop, make it this one. Great for dry dusting too. Better then Libman, O-Cedar or Quickie.
customer_reviews.author: L.Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This mop is much smaller than I expected. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This mop is much smaller than I expected. I have a busy home and need something more heavier. I've not used it yet, I'm sure it will work on a home where there is not so much traffic. I will keep it for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Soft mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. Nice soft cloth material. Great shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeron J.

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Microfiber Cloth Wet Mop
product_meta.description: This soft and versatile mop features super absorbent microfiber strands that attract dirt, dust, hair and moisture. The cleaning power of the microfiber technology lets you clean effectively with just water or vinegar. Features a sturdy adjustable telescoping handle that extends up to 56 inches.
feature_bullets: Is eco-friendly and machine washable up to 100x
Works great for hardwood, linoleum and tile floor cleaning
Is compatible with the Microfiber Cloth Mop Refill
A perfect pairing with our Quick-Wring Bucket (product number B000LNV6ZO)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars994 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
